results.title: Live, Laugh, Love, Home Decor, Metal Wall Art,Wall Sculpture, Asian, Oriental, Inspirational, Motivational
results.description:
LIVE, LAUGH, LOVE
   
   Oriental, is one of the more popular decorating styles today. With this in mind, we are pleased to make available, as wall hangings, three of the more popular words…."Live, Laugh, Love". These pieces will provide that needed focal point in any Oriental-themed room. We sell these as a group of three or they can also be purchased separately. 

                                           Quality Craftsmanship
   
   Each piece measures 9 inches wide by 11 inches tall with the back plate and characters being cut from 12 gauge steel. We use thicker steel, approximately 1/8 inch, than our competitors. We feel this provides a more substantial piece with more eye appeal. It is then prepped and painted by hand, then sealed with a UV protected clear coat. Each piece has a welded loop on the back to facilitate hanging.

                                             Options
   
   As with all of our pieces these can be custom ordered in any size and colors. Please contact us for pricing on larger sizes.

                                           Custom Design
  
    We do not carry a large inventory. We cater to you our Customer, for this reason, we usually cut orders as we receive them. In this way, if you require the piece to be modified (color, special hangers, etc)  then we can accommodate your needs, usually without extra charges.  As a rule, the only extra charge we will make will be for larger sizes….This requires us to put a  fifteen-day shipping time on the piece. Most of the time we ship sooner rather than later. Contact us for pricing on larger sizes.

   Unless requested by a Customer we do not use clip art or purchased designs. Like our other designs, this is an in-house Copyrighted© design. This is an heirloom-quality piece that will be appreciated for generations to come.

Note: This is not a toy. Although we make every effort to make each piece as safe as possible, due to the design there will most likely be sharp edges and sharp points.

results.title: Live Love Laugh Necklace, Heart Jewelry, Inspirational Gifts, Love Necklace, Sterling Silver
results.description:
Live Love Laugh Necklace ~ Live every moment! Live well, love much, laugh often! Three powerful life changing words.#lifegoals 

This high quality sterling silver long pendant has a Live, Laugh, Love Print and is paired with a Sterling Silver Open Heart with Bronze Heart Charm. A gorgeous combination of both silver and bronze comes together to form this sweet design. The open heart is accented by a tiny warm bronze heart to add contrast and a layered look. Dangles on a sterling silver box chain and you can choose your length in the pull down menu. 

The Live Laugh Love pendant measures 30.5mm in length and 12mm in width. 
The Open Heart with Bronze Heart charm measures 18mm in length and 12 mm in width. See listing photo. 

Comes with a polishing pad.  Wrapped with care and shipped in a gift box as listed ~ all ready for the giving!

Thank you so much for visiting Higher Grace Jewelry! We have a wide variety of jewelry, inspiring and thought-provoking, cherishing the simple beautiful moments of life and the loved ones who have been by our side forever. Explore all our collections at:
https://www.etsy.com/shop/highergracejewelry/

Like us on Facebook and follow us on Instagram!
https://www.facebook.com/highergracejewelry/
https://www.instagram.com/highergracejewelry/

The shipping charges are what my post office charges me to send the package to you. VAT charges and other import duties are the buyer's responsibility and vary by country. Please check with your country's customs office or the post office to determine what these additional costs will be prior to buying. These charges are normally collected by the delivering freight (shipping) company or when you pick up the item – do not confuse them for additional shipping charges.

results.description:
This is a Wonderful Custom Personalized Sign.  Lightweight with holes for hanging and Cording added for easy hanging. (Indoor use)

I love the saying of this sign,.  I had to make on for a good friend... as this sign really fit.  She works very hard long hours and needs to take naps, loves Starbucks and Disney.  This sign is perfect!

I also have this sign in a painted version.  Here is the direct link:
https://www.etsy.com/listing/498018527/wood-color-sign-naps-starbucks-disney?ref=shop_home_feat_1

Great for a home, bar, store, wine ship, wine cellar, etc.  

Size - 5  inches across by 7 inches tall.
There are 2 Holes with a string to hang the sign.  I can also make the sign without the holes.  Please let me know in the message area before checking out.  I will email and confirm the request.  

Material - Veneer wood.  The best part of veneer wood is that it is light weight.  (For indoor use)

Price Includes the Custom Design Lettering

Replanting our world, 1 tee at a time.


Print Provider Update:

In an effort to improve design positioning on our t-shirt garments, our print provider has decided to position the front print area 1.5 inches lower than what is shown on our listings. This change will come into effect for orders placed on March 25th and after.

We will be working to adjust all of our listing photos to more accurately represent this change, which may take a few weeks. In the meantime, please be aware that the designs on your purchased t-shirt will appear 1.5 inches lower than indicated in our photos on March 25th and after until all listing photos have been updated. results.title: Live Laugh Love, Korean print, Home decor gifts, Home decor printables, Special day gift, PRINTABLE for home
results.description:
Live Laugh Love, Korean print, Home decor gifts, Home decor printables, Special day gift, PRINTABLE for home

This listing is for a DIGITAL FILE of this artwork.

Hangul (the Korean written language) is a beautiful way to display simple words for you or guests of your home to enjoy. This is the first piece of the Love series. 

You're purchasing a DIGITAL FILE, which can be printed at any print shop or even print on your own printer at home.  Save money by purchasing this digital file and printing yourself.  

You will receive 5 high resolution (300 DPI files):
JPG - 5x7
JPG - 8x10
JPG - 11x14
JPG - 16x20
JPG - 18x24 

NEED A DIFFERENT SIZE?  Please let me know in the 'note to seller' at the checkout, I will resize the file and send it to your email address.

DON’T SEE THE BIBLE VERSE/QUOTE/WORD YOU LIKE? 
If you have any ideas or specific quotes that you’d like to see in my shop, please send me a convo and let me know!

SHIPPING:
THIS IS A DIGITAL PRINT - NO PHYSICAL PRODUCT WILL BE SHIPPED.  You'll be able to download and print this art instantly, as soon as you purchase.  Simply go to http://www.etsy.com/your/purchases to find your downloads after purchasing.

HOW TO PRINT:
Print at home or any professional printing company.  We suggest spending few extra cents and use a nice heavyweight matte paper.  Some printers such as Staples also have great options to print on canvas for a good price.  

FOLLOW ME 
Instagram | Pinterest | Facebook - @KoreanScribbles

License is for PERSONAL USE ONLY. You can print this artwork for yourself or use the print as a gift, but you cannot share or resell the digital files or printed artwork.  

Given the nature of this product, there are NO RETURNS.  But, if you have trouble downloading or printing, please contact me and I'm VERY happy to help!!

results.title: Be our Guest | 16x16 Pillow & Insert | Home Decor | Meditation | Throw Pillow | Graduation Gift | Primitive Decor | Gift for Her
results.description:
Part of a limited selection of seasonal throw pillows we stock to accent our pillow line.

Aren't guest rooms difficult to decorate? You want the decor to be inviting and stylish, but nothing that needs be changed too often, and you generally want a neutral color palette so anyone of any age or gender can appreciate it. But one thing is for sure, every guest wants to feel welcome and at home. Place this soft and inviting complementary pillow on your guest room bed to get a five star hostess rating!

Made from a lovely cotton polyester blend material and is pre-filled, ready to use.  This is a complete pillow with stuffing.

Size: 16"x16" square

* Please note, this order is for 1 pillow.  The image is to show the back pattern of the pillow you are ordering.

results.description:

Most of us made a basic one of these in kindergarten, right? If this design doesn't hit the boho bullseye, we don't know what will! We all know someone who seems to fit this quote: "She has the Soul of a Gypsy The Heart of a Hippie The Spirit of a Fairy."  So why not gift it to them for a birthday, anniversary, off-to-college gift, or for Christmas?

results.title: Love with Jesus Fish - Car/Truck/Phone/Computer/Home/Laptop Decal
results.description:
Note: All decals are di-cut. The decals Do Not include a wood/fencing background. 

Welcome to Decal Phanatics!

CUSTOM SIZES AND DESIGNS ARE AVAILABLE
-Brand New Decals
-5 Year Vinyl
-Waterproof, Durable
-Includes Transfer Tape applied to decal for smooth installation

Payment Terms:
Paypal, Credit Cards, and Debit Cards 
Shipping within the US is $1.99 plus $0.25 for each additional decal

Return Policy:
Accepted for unused items only.  

100% Satisfaction Guarantee

Installation: 
1. Clean application area. Use water (no Windex). Do not apply on extremely hot or cold surfaces.  
2. Prepare the decal by rubbing a credit card across the clear transfer tape
3. Peel the white paper backing off the sticker
4. Slowly place the decal onto the desired surface. Rub/Press decal firmly with credit card. 
5. Slowly peel the clear transfer tape off at from the top corner. Do not pull decal off while peeling transfer tape. 

Areas of Application: Car/Truck Windows, Car Body Surfaces, Bikes, Helmets, Motorcycles, Computers, Skateboards, Snowboards, Guitars, Mirrors, Laptops, Home Walls, Home Windows, Store Windows, Doors, Laminate, Boats, Toolboxes, etc. 

Contact me at decalphanatics@gmail.com for any questions, concerns, custom orders.

Thanks!

results.title: Live More Laugh More Love More Gilmore Girls Tee | Women's Graphic Tee | Gilmore Girls T-Shirt | Gilmore Girls Shirt | Lorelai and Rory Tee
results.description:
Are you a Gilmore Girls fan?  Then this fun graphic tee is sure to please!  

This updated UNISEX essential tee is AMAZING!  It’s not just another boyfriend tee. This tee fits like a well-loved favorite with its crew neck, short sleeves and Airlume combed and ring-spun cotton.  SO SOFT and comfy!  It’s perfect for layering and can be dressed up for a night out or down for a comfortable casual look. 

→ UNISEX Sizes Available:
Small, Medium, Large, X-Large, and XX-Large

IMPORTANT NOTE:

This is a UNISEX tee.  Most women order their normal size for a looser fit or size down for a more fitted look.

{{ Please view the sizing chart located in the above images before ordering.}}

------HOW TO ORDER------

1.  Simply choose your SHIRT SIZE and COLOR from the drop down menus on the top right.

2.  During check out, leave a note in the “notes to seller" section with your choice of vinyl color for the font/graphics.  Font color options are pictured in the images above.  We have many in stock font color options to choose from.  If you have a little more time and want to show your creativity, we offer even more special order vinyl color options for no additional charge.

* We have a lot of special order vinyl colors already in stock, but in limited quantities.  If you would like a special order vinyl color, it usually only adds 1-3 extra processing days to your order.  Please don’t hesitate to ask if you have questions.


------SHIPPING------

All orders are shipped within 3-5 BUSINESS days via USPS and tracking information will be uploaded as soon as it's shipped for your convenience.  Please keep in mind if your ship by date falls on a US holiday, your order will ship the next business day.

→ If you need a rush order, please contact us prior to ordering to ensure we can accommodate you.  Additional costs may apply.

→ Please feel free to contact us with any questions or special requests. Custom ordering is always welcome.

→ Please be sure to read our Shipping & Policies page and our FAQs before purchasing for more detailed information on production and shipping times, as well as our return/exchange policy.

Be Kind Designs Co. strives for 100% customer satisfaction. Please, do not hesitate to contact us with any concern.  We are here to help.

In order to provide an exceptional quality product, our garments all come from Bella + Canvas and are made with high quality Siser heat transfer vinyl or glitter and are hand pressed using a professional heat press in our home studio with special care to detail.  

------CARE INSTRUCTIONS------

Wash garment inside out on gentle or delicate cycle in cold water.  Dry garment inside out on low setting.  Do not bleach.  Do not iron directly on design.  If ironing is needed, turn garment inside out and iron.

Garment Specifications:

Unisex Tee Description: 
→Side-seamed
→Shoulder taping
→Fitted at bicep
→Retail fit
→Unisex sizing

Solid Colors: 
→100% Airlume combed and ring-spun cotton
→32 singles
→4.2 oz.
Black Heather:
→90% Airlume combed and ring-spun cotton
→10% polyester
Heather CVC/Blend Colors:
→52% Airlume combed and ring-spun cotton
→48% polyester

results.title: Live, Love, Laugh Charm Sterling Silver 14mm, silver Words Charms, Sterling Silver Charms, Live charms, Love charms, Laugh charms - SP383
results.description:
Beautiful Live, Love, Laugh charm.  Casted with 925 Sterling Silver in USA.

0.7 inch high.

14mm x 17.5mm

We offer this charm with different attachments at the top. Based on your requirements, please choose one from the drop down options, All attachments are sterling silver.

1. With Jumpring, this is best if you are using it as a pendant on a neck chain.

2. With springring clasp, this is best suited for charm bracelets.

3. With lobster claw clasps,  this works if you want to attach to any thing with a loop or jumpring.

4. With Large/Big Hole beads, this makes the charm as a charm bead for European bracelets like Pandora, Camila etc.

5. With 16 Inch Sterling silver 1.5mm Flat cable Chain with Spring Ring Closure.

6. With 18 Inch Sterling silver 1.5mm Flat cable Chain with Spring Ring Closure.

7. No attachment, charm only.

For option number 4, please mention which bead you would like.

See all my sterling silver charms
